channel.title: Music – Carol kidd
channel.description: Recent content in Carol kidd on Music

item.title: Carol kidd - WHEN I DREAM
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Mason
KY: 5818 / KY: 7816

I could build
a mansion
that is higher
than the trees
I could have all
the gifts I want
and never ask
to leave
I could fly
to paris
it’s at my
beck and call
why do I live
my life alone
with nothing
at- all
but when I dream
I dream of you
maybe some day
you will come true
when I dream
I dream of you
maybe some day
you will come true-

I can be- the singer
or the clown
in any room
I can call up someone
to take me
to the moon
I can put
my makeup on
and drive
the men insane
I can go
to bed alone
and never know-
his name
but when I dream
I dream of you
maybe some day
you will come true
when I dream
I dream of you
maybe some day
you will come true-
